com.plexus.sam.audio
Class DynamicPlaylist

java.lang.Object
  com.plexus.sam.audio.DynamicPlaylist
All Implemented Interfaces:
Playlist
public class DynamicPlaylist
extends java.lang.Object
implements Playlist

The dynamic playlist uses a policy rather than a real list to determine the next songs to be played.

For every songgroup a relevance value can be set, the playlist will pick songs randomly, but the odds are determined by the relevance factors.

A relevance factor of 0 means no songs will be picked.

Author:
plexus
